Question
========

From a population, the following 5 numbers were drawn:_____________. 57, 43, 89, 66, 70. Give the SEM (Standard Error of the Mean), the estimated standard deviation of the sample mean.

Answerlist
----------

* 6.78
* 7.58
* 16.96
* 57.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 6.78: Incorrect
* 7.58: Correct
* 16.96: Incorrect
* 57.5: Incorrect
